group_1.textRight: Well done out there, senpais.

group_1.textLeft: Same to you.

group_1.textRight: What's up?

group_1.textLeft: Nothing much. It's just, I hadn't taken much@notice of it until now...
But my weapons are ink brushes, aren't they?

group_1.textRight: Looks like it.
Hey, maybe your magic is a "Brush Master" sort@of thing?

group_1.textLeft: I don't think I can dramatically improve my@penmanship or the like, no.

group_1.textRight: Maybe a bottomless well of inspiration for waka@poems?

group_1.textLeft: ...Nope. No more inspiration than I had@previously.
I *am* fond of waka, though, so perhaps it's got@something to do with that...

group_1.textRight: Komachi-senpai! Kira-senpai! We've got something@much more important to deal with right now!
The Witch dropped this!

group_1.textLeft: ...A Grief Seed.@Who should take this one?

group_1.textRight: I've still got some left.

group_1.textLeft: As do I...
How about you, Mihono?

group_1.textRight: My supply should still last me a while.

group_1.textLeft: Looks like we've finally got an extra!
Though it can't hurt to have as many as possible,@of course.

group_1.textRight: We could always take it to the Coordinator as@well, you know?

group_1.textLeft: True... We haven't stopped by once since we@were first introduced to her.

group_1.textRight: Shall we go, then?

group_1.textLeft: Oh, girls~!@Long time no see♪
I see you remembered your lovely neighborhood@Coordinator, yes?

group_1.textRight: My apologies.@We've been busy for a while...

group_1.textLeft: That's only natural!
Fledgling Magical Girls always have a lot on@their plate starting out.
After all, it's a huge change in environment@compared to your previous lifestyle.

group_1.textRight: You've got that right!@Every day is exhausting.

group_1.textLeft: There may not be as many really tough Witches@in town any more...
But making yourself stronger is never a bad@thing!
So if you ever feel like dropping by like this,@I'll give you a nice tune-up~.
Oh, that's right.
Are the three of you the only girls on your@team?

group_1.textRight: Yes... is that strange?

group_1.textLeft: Nope, not particularly.
It's just that nowadays...
Most of Kamihama's Magical Girls have joined@the Kamihama Magia Union...
So I thought I'd ask out of curiosity.

group_1.textRight: ...I've only heard about it secondhand.@It's a large Magical Girl group, yes?
Do you mean that...@Since we can't beat 'em, we should join 'em?!

group_1.textLeft: Every girl has her own outlook, of course.
As a matter of fact, some of my customers...
Are doing just fine for themselves without any@affiliation.♪

group_1.textRight: Also... we don't actually live in Kamihama, for@that matter.
Yeah. At any rate, we probably don't have to@decide on short notice?

group_1.textLeft: Yes, I think that's a good way to look at it!
Ooh, also.
Have you visited "Endless Mirrors" already?

group_1.textRight: No... What kind of place is that?

group_1.textLeft: It's a very big Labyrinth, sort of like a house@of mirrors.
Enemies in the more shallow Mirror Layers aren't@particularly scary.
So if you're planning to work as an independent@trio for the time being...
It might be a good place to hone your teamwork!

group_1.textRight: ...May we hear more about it?

group_1.textLeft: Sure thing! ♪
